Name: Jollof
Instructions: Cook pasta. Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan. Toss cooked pasta with egg mixture.

Name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Instructions: Preheat oven. Mix ingredients. Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet. Bake until golden.

Name: Chicken Alfredo
Instructions: Cook fettuccine. Cook chicken. Make Alfredo sauce. Combine.

Name: Mango Salsa
Instructions: Chop ingredients. Mix together in a bowl. Serve with tortilla chips.
